Looking at the shareholder composition table: - JAIME ALEXANDER FRANCO PEDRAZA (NIT 79770147): 20.000 acciones, 20.000.000 Capital Pagado, 33,33% - MARTHA LILIA CELIS GORDO (NIT 51880385): 20.000 acciones, 20.000.000 Capital Pagado, 33,33% - GIOVANNY ANDRES VEGA FORERO (NIT 79958347): 20.000 acciones, 20.000.000 Capital Pagado, 33,33% Wait, I need to be careful here. In Colombia, personal IDs are typically C.C. (Cédula de Ciudadanía). The format appears to be consistent with Colombian C.C. format. Let me apply the Colombia ID type rules: - After removing dots: 79770147 matches /^[1-9][0-9]{3,9}$/ so this would be C.C. - 51880385 matches the same pattern, so C.C. - 79958347 matches the same pattern, so C.C.
